title: Giant Concrete Umbrellas Could Protect the Lucky Ones From Storm Surge
description: A group of engineers from Princeton University think that giant concrete umbrellas could help deflect storm surge and rising seas. In a new study published this month in the Journal of Structural Engineering, the researchers laid out preliminary designs for t…
